name: tm48
effect: Teaches Skill Swap to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Skill Swap Gen II: Fire Punch Gen I: Rock Slide)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Switches abilities
with the foe on the
turn this is used.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Switches abilities
with the foe on the
turn this is used.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user employs
its psychic power
to swap abilities
with the foe.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user employs its psychic power to
exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user employs its psychic power to
exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user employs its psychic power to
exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round and
make the attack do greater damage.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round and
make the attack do greater damage.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user attacks the target with a song.
Others can join in the Round and make
the attack do greater damage.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks the target with a song. Others
can join in the Round to increase the power of
the attack.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks the target with a song. Others
can join in the Round to increase the power of
the attack.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is attacked with a powerful beam.
The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers
the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.
